ThingsGateway.Foundation.SiemensS7.Sieme.AddressDes:
S7 Protocol Register Address Format
Txxxxx Timer Register, for example T100/T100.1
Cxxxxx Counter Register, for example C100/C100.1
AIxxxxx AI Register, for example AI100/AI100.1
AQxxxxx AQ Register, for example AQ100/AQ100.1
Ixxxxx I Register, for example I100/I100.1
Qxxxxx Q Register, for example Q100/Q100.1
Mxxxxx M Register, for example M100/M100.1
DBxxxxx DB Register, for example DB100.1/DB100.1.1
ThingsGateway.Foundation.SiemensS7.Sieme.ReturnError: PLC returns error code, error type {0}, error code {1}
ThingsGateway.Foundation.SiemensS7.Sieme.NotString: Data type in PLC is not String
ThingsGateway.Foundation.SiemensS7.Sieme.StringLengthReadError: Consecutive reading of variable-length strings not supported
ThingsGateway.Foundation.SiemensS7.Sieme.HandshakeError1: {0}: ISO_TP handshake failed - {1}, please check if the rack number/slot number is correct
ThingsGateway.Foundation.SiemensS7.Sieme.HandshakeError2: {0}: PDU initialization failed - {1}, please check if the rack number/slot number is correct
